maqras.text: O vi kred vi est absolutely equitable observ DI when vi serv witnesses eben yourselves your parents your relativ! Whether akuz est ricx poor DI sorb zorg da ambaux! Do ne biased your personal wishes Vi deviate disregard (this commandment) tiam DI est fully Cognizant de cxio vi do

O vi kred vi kred en DI His messenger scripture Li revealed His messenger scripture Li revealed antaux ke. Anyone rifuz kred en DI His angxel His scriptures His messengers Last Tag hav ja strayed far astray
Surely those kred tiam disbelieve tiam kred tiam disbelieve tiam plongx profund into disbelief DI testament ne forgive them nor vol Li direkt them en any voj
Inform hypocrites ke ili incurred painful retribution
Ili est unu ally disbelievers believers. Ili streb dign them? All dign aparten DI sol

Li instructed vi scripture vi auxd di revelations mok ridiculed vi ne sid them ili delve another subjekt! Otherwise vi est as kulp as ili est DI testament gather hypocrites disbelievers together EN INFER

Ili watch vi wait vi ating victory DI ili dir (al vi) Est ni ne vi? disbelievers get turn ili dir (al them) Did ni ne flank vi protekt vi el believers? DI testament jugx inter vi Tag Resurrection! DI testament NENIAM PERMES disbelievers prevail believers
hypocrites opini ili tromp DI Li est Unu plumb them sur. When ili get por Kontakt Prayer (Salat) ili get lazily. Ke est ili nur montr popol rarely do ili opini da DI
Ili waver en inter nek aparten al this grup nor ke grup! Whomever DI send astray vi neniam trov voj direkt him
O vi kred vi ne ally disbelievers believers! Vi wish proviz DI klar proof vi
hypocrites committed lowest pit de Infer vi trov ne 1 help them
Nur those pent reform ten fast al DI devote their religi absolutely DI sol counted believers! DI testament BEN believers great recompense
Ki vol DI gajn pun vi vi igx appreciative kred DI est Appreciative Omniscient
